Episodes.Title: Episode #1.1
Episodes.Actors: Lobo Chan, Cillian Murphy, Benjamin Zephaniah
Episodes.Plot: Thomas Shelby plans to fix a horse race; some guns turn up stolen.

Episodes.Title: Episode #1.2
Episodes.Actors: Cillian Murphy, Paul Anderson, Joe Cole
Episodes.Plot: Thomas Shelby starts a feud with a gypsy family and finally meets with Inspector Campbell to talk about the stolen guns.

Episodes.Title: Episode #1.3
Episodes.Actors: Cillian Murphy, Sam Neill, Helen McCrory
Episodes.Plot: Thomas is livid to find out that Ada and Freddie are married; IRA sympathizers tries to get information from Thomas about the stolen guns.

Episodes.Title: Episode #1.4
Episodes.Actors: Sophie Rundle, Iddo Goldberg, John-Paul Hurley
Episodes.Plot: Thomas attempts to make a deal with Campbell; The Peaky's war with the Lees intensifies.

Episodes.Title: Episode #1.5
Episodes.Actors: Cillian Murphy, Helen McCrory, Sophie Rundle
Episodes.Plot: The Shelbys get a surprise visit by an almost forgotten relative. Thomas has one more dangerous plan with the cops.

Episodes.Title: Episode #1.6
Episodes.Actors: Lobo Chan, Sam Neill, Cillian Murphy
Episodes.Plot: Tommy and the Peaky Blinders prepare for a big operation, that quickly becomes way trickier than they thought.
